SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.contact

Interface IContactReviewPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
public interface IContactReviewPlugin extends InternalPlugin
Used to update contact reviews, which are usually managed by ContactManager. Part of service provider management, a feature which allows users to add reviews and scores for contacts who provide services (such as auto repair shops). Users can then select service providers who have been well reviewed by other users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteReview(Review review)
    Deletes the summary corresponding to a completed Review from ContactManager.
    Integer
    scoreReview(Review review)
    Scores the review for a given set of answers.
    String

    Submits a summary of the completed Review to ContactManager.
    void
    updateScores(Contact contact)
    Indicate to ContactManager that it should update the scores for a given Contact.

  • Method Details

    • scoreReview

      Integer scoreReview(Review review)
      Scores the review for a given set of answers. NOTE: If using category scores, this should create/update those scores on the Review object as necessary.
      Parameters:
      review - the review to be scored
      Returns:
      the overall score for the review

    • submitReview

      String submitReview(Review review) throws RemoteException
      Submits a summary of the completed Review to ContactManager.
      Parameters:
      review - the completed review
      Returns:
      the addressBookUID for the submitted ReviewSummary
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a problem connecting to the ContactManager server.

    • deleteReview

      void deleteReview(Review review) throws RemoteException
      Deletes the summary corresponding to a completed Review from ContactManager.
      Parameters:
      review - the completed review
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a problem connecting to the ContactManager server.

    • updateScores

      void updateScores(Contact contact) throws RemoteException
      Indicate to ContactManager that it should update the scores for a given Contact.
      Parameters:
      contact - - a contact, which must be linked to ContactManager
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a problem connecting to the ContactManager server.
